# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. With its unique features and high-quality materials, it's designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $75. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the best we have to offer! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $75. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $75
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
